optional.lab2

Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • optional.lab2.Problem

  • public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
    Problem is the class to describe the given transportation problem It consists of :
    • An array of sources Source
    • An array of destinations Destination
    • An array of supplies (for each of the sources)
    • An array of demands (for each of the destinations)
    • A cost matrix, in which we store the costs from a source to a destination
    • A linked list LinkedList to store the solution
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitri Cojocari

      • getSolution

        public int getSolution()
        Computes the optimal cost for the given instance
        Returns:
        the result is the sum of the products of the supply cost and demand units
